text: Ilya Chernyshov (born 6 September 1985) is a Kazakh cyclist. He competed in the men's Madison at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==Palmares== ;2006 :1st Asian Games Team Time Trail ::1st Overall Tour d'Egypte ::1st Stage 2 ;2007 :2nd Overall Mainfranken Tour ;2008 :1st Stage 1 Cycling Golden Jersey (TTT) ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani male cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Kazakhstan Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Kazakhstan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Kazakhstan Category:Medalists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Olympic cyclists of Kazakhstan Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics
title: Ilya Chernyshov
